name: Devil's Henchman
description:
You are the devils last and most loyal henchman. You have to bring back the devil, that has becomed so weak, that he currently dont have powers to be more than a flame. Collect souls from heaven, so you can sacrifice them to the devil himself, but be aware of the angels guarding heaven. Will it be worth the effort?

ASWD or ARROW KEYS - to move

Space to DASH

Shift to CLOAK

Left Click to SHOOT
